SUMMARY:  INNER | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL:  FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.iso_relax.miaou.mySs
Class AttributeNormalizer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.iso_relax.miaou.mySs.AttributeNormalizer
public class AttributeNormalizer
extends java.lang.Object

This class converts <attribute> to <oneOrMoreAttribute> and introduces <nonExistentAttribute>.

  • (p1 | p2 | ... | pi | @n1[q1] | @n2[q2] | ... | @nj[qj] )+
  • (p1 | p2 | ... | pi | @n1[q1] | @n2[q2] | ... | @nj[qj] )*
  • @{a1,a2,...,an}[p] outside of <oneOrMore>
  • <choice>p1 p2 </choice>
Case 1: (p1 | p2 | ... | pi | @n1[p1] | @n2[p2] | ... | @nj[pj] )+ 1) j = 0 original = (p1 | p2 | ... | pi)+ 2) i = 0 normalizeOneOrMoreAttributes({@n1[p1], @n2[p2], ..., @nj[pj]}) 3) otherwise normalizeOneOrMoreAttributes({@n1[p1], @n2[p2], ... , @nj[pj]}) | ((@n1[p1]* | @n2[p2]* | ... | @nj[pj]*) (p1 | p2 | ... | pi)+) Case 2: (p1 | p2 | ... | pi | @n1[p1] | @n2[p2] | ... | @nj[pj] )* 1) j = 0 original = (p1 | p2 | ... | pi)* 2) i = 0

Version:
0.3
Author:
MURATA Makoto
